title: No chest
body:
I played Aatrox (own and no ches on him) I got an S on him before but I didn't have a chest available 


On my team a Nocturne got an S (I own and have no chest on him)


I currently have 2 chests available 


Is this a bug or am I missing something?

replies.body:
In the Aatrox example, you didn't have a chest available which would make sense as to why you didn't get one.

For the Nocturne game, you need to own the champion YOU were playing to get a chest from a teammate getting an S.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ElwxYls7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-27T22:37:07.232+0000)
>
> In the Aatrox example, you didn't have a chest available which would make sense as to why you didn't get one.
> 
> For the Nocturne game, you need to own the champion YOU were playing to get a chest from a teammate getting an S.

Sorry I didn't explain properly.

-I own both Aatrox and Nocturne, I haven't gotten a chest on both of them.
-I had 2 chests available (currently 1 cause I got an S on ekko)
-I was Aatrox and got a B, my teammate (not premade) was Nocturne and got an S
- a while back I got an S on Aatrox but I had no chests available

Someone told me you only get a chest from someone else only if they're premade with you, but I remember reading somewhere that as long as your teammate gets an S you'll get the chest

> [{quoted}](name=Drakavoid,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ElwxYls7,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-28T03:05:53.248+0000)
>

> Someone told me you only get a chest from someone else only if they're premade with you, but I remember reading somewhere that as long as your teammate gets an S you'll get the chest

This is wrong, you only get chests from your own or PREMADE s-rank, non premades do not render you chests
i guess you recently got banned or chat restricted and cant receive them.

> [{quoted}](name=gg me,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ElwxYls7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-27T10:16:46.196+0000)
>
> i guess you recently got banned or chat restricted and cant receive them.

I never got banned or muted. However I do have the afk penalty currently, but I never heard about penalty taking away chests
